mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from orders where sto_num=#{sto_num}

select * from (select o.*, rownum rnum from (select o.*, p.PAY_TYPE_NAME from orders o, pay_type p where o.sto_num=#{stoNum} and o.pay_type_num = p.pay_type_num order by ord_num desc)o) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select o.*, m.MEN_NAME from order_list o, menu m where o.ord_num=#{val} and o.men_num = m.men_num
mapper.update: update orders set ord_state=#{ord_state} where ord_num=#{ord_num}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from orders where mem_num=#{mem_num}

select * from (select o.*, rownum rnum from (select o.*, p.PAY_TYPE_NAME, s.sto_name from orders o, pay_type p, stores s where o.mem_num=#{memNum} and o.pay_type_num = p.pay_type_num and o.sto_num = s.sto_num order by ord_num desc)o) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select o.* from(select rownum rnum ,ord_point, ord_num,ord_deli_time from orders where mem_num=#{mem_num} order by ord_deli_time desc)o where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select o.*, p.PAY_TYPE_NAME, s.sto_name from orders o, pay_type p, stores s where o.mem_num=#{mem_num} and o.pay_type_num = p.pay_type_num and o.sto_num = s.sto_num and ord_num=#{ord_num}
